BodyName: Committee on Mental Health, Developmental Disability, Alcoholism, Substance Abuse and Disability Services

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the designation of disability service facilitators at city agencies
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Designation of disability service facilitators at city agencies.

Items.Title: A Local Law amend the New York city charter, in relation to requiring the installation of induction loops systems for certain capital projects paid in whole or in part from the city treasury and requiring the publication of public locations where such systems are available.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring that all public meetings be held in facilities equipped with assistive listening systems.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring advertising and other materials pertaining to public events to include information regarding accessibility for people with disabilities.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring advertising and other materials pertaining to public events to include information regarding accessibility for people with disabilities.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the designation of disability service facilitators at city agencies
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
